pkg:pull:
sh -c 'git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "
You project has modifications, please commit and push or stash them first.
" && exit 1)' -

sh -c 'git subtree merge --prefix="pkg/$1" git@github.com:$1.git main || git checkout $(git --no-pager log -1 --format="%H" -- pkg/$1/)^ -- pkg/$1 && git commit -am "Restore package $1" || git subtree merge --prefix="pkg/$1" git@github.com:$1.git main || git subtree pull --prefix="pkg/$1" git@github.com:$1.git main;' -
echo "It's fully integrated into your repository as if you wrote it yourself.\n"
echo "You can make changes directly in your repository, and the commits will be saved to your own history.\n"
echo "Itâ€™s perfectly fine to maintain a customized version of the package within your main project.\n"
echo "If you have sufficient permissions, you can push your changes to the central package repository using: composer pkg:push $1.\n"

scripts-descriptions.pkg:use: Install a package from a pkg repository. For example: `composer pkg:use confetti-cms/bool`
